title: 820-01041 boot loop
message:
820-01041 bootloop

Client said he just close the lid and went for launch.
When come back there was black screen and boot loop.

There is boot loop even when lid is closed until battery is flat.


Client need data and it is detected in DFU but every time during 'Revive' it will reboot so device process is canceled.

There is half of chime sound and reboot.

PP2V5_NAND got 2.5V

Any idea?

title: 820-01041 boot loop
message: Can you put the machine in target disk mode?

title: 820-01041 boot loop
message:
Target Disk Mode successful - data copied.

Restore in DFU then?

title: 820-01041 boot loop
message:
Restore successful.
All works fine with fresh system.

Many thanks :)
